Pre-Game Insights: Moldova will face Malta at the Stadionul Zimbru on Saturday in the opening game of their 2024-25 UEFA Nations League campaign.
Moldova performed fairly well in the previous edition of the Nations League, winning four of their six group games but ultimately missed out on promotion due to goal difference.
Malta have endured a poor run of form in recent games and will be desperate to turn a corner when they return to competitive action this weekend.
Moldova's latest result ended a run of back-to-back victories and they will be looking to bounce back here.
Malta are on a run of consecutive defeats and are without a win in their last eight games across all competitions.
Miscellaneous Highlights: There have been eight meetings between Moldova and Malta. The home side have won four of those games while the visitors have won just once. There have been three draws between the two teams.
The hosts are undefeated in their last five games in this fixture, a run stretching back to February 2004.
The visitors have managed just one clean sheet in their last eight games across all competitions.
The Tricolours were ranked 152nd in the latest FIFA rankings and now sit 20 places above their weekend opponents.
